lead_paragraph: Mattel has unveiled curvy, petite and tall versions of its fashion doll whose unrealistically thin shape has drawn criticism for decades. Sales have plunged as Barbie has struggled to remain relevant.

headline.print_headline: Barbie Now Comes in Tall, Short and Curvy
headline.main: Barbie Adds Curvy and Tall to Body Shapes

snippet: Mattel has unveiled curvy, petite and tall versions of its fashion doll whose unrealistically thin shape has drawn criticism for decades. Sales have plunged as Barbie has struggled to remain relevant.
abstract: Mattel introduces new versions of its Barbie fashion doll, featuring curvy, petite and tall body types; sales of unrealistically thin doll have dropped precipitously over past several years, as little girls play with toys other than dolls.
